snippet: Kansas politics have been tilting more to the right for at least the last two decades, and now that shift is prompting a bitter clash within the state’s Republican Party.
abstract: Kansas is undergoing a bitter primary battle between hard-line and moderate Republicans over seats in the state Legislature; state has a deep-rooted history of centrist conservatism, but has been drifting rightward for over two decades.
lead_paragraph: Kansas politics have been tilting more to the right for at least the last two decades, and now that shift is prompting a bitter clash within the state’s Republican Party.

headline.seo: In Kansas Primaries, Conservatives Attack Fellow Republicans
headline.main: In Kansas, Conservatives Vilify Fellow Republicans
headline.print_headline: In Kansas, Conservatives Vilify Fellow Republicans
